body: Im guessing shes too young for her periods to start yet but will this keep happening till she leaves the house for good? Shes gonna get preggers fast, also how has her parents not noticed the stench of semen yet? No sixth sense for ghost cum?

@trasher2kx the answer is simple, translators dont do this shit for free, some do but those are usually independent fan translations that arent always high quality. If you want Kanroame translations go find a TL group willing to do loli and pay for a commission.
i'm curious why translator take so much time for kanroame while some translate other authors in less than 1 week, is he unpopular or what? yeah yeah sure kill me i dont mind
Ok let me restate that... Just saw the whole thing and its all in here... Sorry my bad... This is the end of this series.
